products.name: Maroon Oxford Shirt (Slim Fit)
products.note: A multistep process that includes high-tension yarn-spinning gives this shirt's pure cotton poplin a dose of softeness/comfort for ease of movement. Oxford shirts are named for their weave, slightly coarser than most shirts providing the lightest texture. A classic all-rounder, business and casual Oxford shirts alike can be worn in all seasons.
description: ✓ Available in single cuff with two buttons.
